name: Space Adventure Jam
description:
For HTC VIVE

I have previously worked on another VR Puzzle Game, Dont Press That Button

https://uswgames.itch.io/dont-press-that-button

This is a very early prototype of a Keep talking and nobody explodes style game, It was created in a few days as part of a university game jam.

It takes place on a space station that is suffering from a fire, you as the player must make your way through the station opening doors along the way in an effort to reach the escape pod.

The multiplayer aspect comes from the manual that player two uses to aid player one in the virtual world.

This is purely a prototype, any feedback on: the concept, game play, performance or issues would be greatly appreciated.
